title: Further provided that in all above cases the relocation ofslum dwellers in any case will be undertaken not with reference to individuals but reference to assembly of slum dwellers for the purpose of releasing the plot of land wholly from slums and not only the patches of land
clause_text: Further provided that in all above cases the relocation ofslum dwellers in any case will be undertaken not with reference to individuals but reference to assembly of slum dwellers for the purpose of releasing the plot of land wholly from slums and not only the patches of land.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
